public class EditStationUI
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Form
implements javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, javax.microedition.lcdui.ItemCommandListener

Edit station information form class. Used also for new station information input.

Author:
Roman Bondarenko

Method Detail

init

public void init(StationInfo si)
Second level initialization. Used before show this form for setting up station information to edit.

Parameters:
si - Station information object. If it is null, then form interacts as New station form, Edit station othrwise.
